name: Fires&Drums
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill from Alexa provides a daily briefing of top stories related to firefighting news, events, and notes. Just ask Alexa " Alexa, what's my flash briefing", and she will update you! There are no harware or account requirements to use this skill. Note: the URL for this skill is: https://www.firerescue1.com/firefighting-rss-feeds/top_story.xml
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
